data.name: Oldage - Recommended Pack
data.detailed_description:
This is a booster pack to help you get started!
In here you have everything you need plus an exclusive skin!
This package includes:
1. A Priest with "Highorder" skin (115 coins worth)
2. A Bishop with "Pray to win" skin (150 coins worth)
3. A Knight (76 coins worth)
3. A Marksman (60 coins worth)
4. A Pikeman (50 coins worth)
5. A Thief (70 coins worth)
6. A Gold Boost (100 coins worth)
7. An Inventory Expansion (100 coins worth)
8. 400 coins
* In total: 1121 coins worth, saving 5 dollars and getting an exclusive skin!
* Please note you can only buy this expansion once
* The "Pray to win" skin is an exclusive skin, you cannot purchase it otherwise.

data.short_description: Setting your arsenal made easy! Buy the recommended package from the developers and start competing right away!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and Above
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster (x86 compatible)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB of video memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game is very light - it can run on very low-spec computers

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.2 and Above
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster (x86_64 only)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB of video memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game is very light - it can run on very low-spec computers

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Preferably Ubuntu 16.04, can work on other versions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster (x86_64 only)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game is very light - it can run on very low-spec computers
